channel.title: Adding More stats
channel.description: Hey im using a syscape client and a delta based server source. Currently my most recent stat is farming. I want to add the construction hunter and summoning stat to my server. (Not the skill) I want the interface to be in my server because I will be turning them into custom skills. Can anyone give me a working guide on how to add the skill interface into my server? This is what i'm trying to get. [IMG]http://i1001.photobucket.com/albums/af135/DemonBoi445/CUSTOM29.png[/img]
